docs.abstract: New England Patriots coach Bill Belichick's love of Baltimore Ravens safety Ed Reed will be highlighted when teams face off in AFC championship game.

headline.seo: Ravens’ Reed Always Draws Praise from Patriots’ Belichick
headline.main: When Asked About the Ravens’ Reed, Belichick Can’t Stop Pouring On the Praise

docs.snippet: She’s fictional, but you can’t have everything....
docs.lead_paragraph: She’s fictional, but you can’t have everything.
docs.abstract: Gail Collins Op-Ed column argues that hoax involving Notre Dame linebacker Manti Te'o and a fictional girlfriend bespeaks the desire to fulfill an old sports fantasy--winning a game on behalf of a dying loved one.

docs.snippet: Manti Te’o broke his silence Friday and told ESPN that he did not make up the story of a girlfriend who had died to bolster his chances of winning the Heisman Trophy....
docs.lead_paragraph: Manti Te’o broke his silence Friday and told ESPN that he did not make up the story of a girlfriend who had died to bolster his chances of winning the Heisman Trophy.
docs.abstract: Notre Dame linebacker Manti Te'o breaks his silence and tells ESPN in off-camera interview that he did not make up story of girlfriend who had died to bolster his chances of winning the Heisman Trophy.

byline.contributor: Michelle Broder Van Dyke contributed reporting from Laie, Hawaii.

docs.lead_paragraph: Greg Roman, the 49ers’ offensive coordinator and perhaps the most underrated person in another dominant 49ers season, made the offense unpredictable, formidable and dangerous.
docs.abstract: San Francisco 49ers offensive coordinator Greg Roman remains one of the team's most underrated assets, having forged an offense that is unpredictable, formidable and dangerous; 49ers are preparing for NFC championship game against Atlanta Falcons.

headline.seo: Greg Roman Is the 49ers’ Quarterback Whisperer

docs.snippet: The father of Lizzy Seeberg, a woman who committed suicide after accusing a Notre Dame football player of sexual assault, says the university was less inclined to thoroughly investigate that case....
docs.lead_paragraph: The father of Lizzy Seeberg, a woman who committed suicide after accusing a Notre Dame football player of sexual assault, says the university was less inclined to thoroughly investigate that case.
docs.abstract: Tom Seeberg, father of Notre Dame student, Lizzy Seeberg, who committed suicide in 2010 after accusing a football player of sexual assault, says university did less to investigate a rape charge than when it found out their star football player had been the victim of a hoax.

headline.seo: Notre Dame Handled Te’o and Seeberg Cases Differently, Some Say
headline.main: In Notre Dame’s Handling of Two Episodes, Some See Inconsistency
headline.print_headline: In Notre Dame’s Handling of Two Episodes, Some See Inconsistency
